section.title: profit centers adding new numbers for Profit Center Number
section.para: To add a new Profit Center Number, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Profit Center Number, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a number to identify the Profit Center.
Enter a brief description of the Profit Center.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Profit Center Number, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Profit Center Number and adds it to the master list of Profit Center Numbers.
